blogPost.excerpt: Now sales, marketing, and finance operators can crush KPIs with machine learning. Our easy-to-use, powerful, and affordable ML platform guides you from data to live predictions in 5 minutes. No code or data science expertise needed.
blogPost.body: Now sales, marketing, and finance operators can crush KPIs with machine learning. Our easy-to-use, powerful, and affordable ML platform guides you from data to live predictions in 5 minutes. No code or data science expertise needed.
blogPost.title: Akkio - No-code ML for modern sales and marketing teams
blogPost.author: Abraham Parangi

localize.description: 现在，销售、营销和财务操作员可以通过机器学习粉碎KPI。我们的ML平台简单易用、功能强大、价格合理，可在5分钟内指导您从数据到实时预测。无需代码或数据科学专业知识。
localize.tagline: 适用于现代销售和营销团队的无代码ML。

localize.description: 現在，銷售、營銷和財務操作員可以通過機器學習粉碎KPI。我們的ML平臺簡單易用、功能強大、價格合理，可在5分鐘內指導您從數據到實時預測。無需代碼或數據科學專業知識。
localize.tagline: 適用於現代銷售和營銷團隊的無代碼ML。

localize.tagline: 把伯尼-桑德斯放在使用谷歌地图街景的地方。

next.excerpt: ABBYY FineScanner AI is the best in class scanning app that turns your mobile device into a productivity tool to quickly capture documents and books, create digital copies in PDF and DOCX, and recognize text on scans for further editing and sharing.
next.title: ABBYY FineScanner AI 8 - Smart scanner app to make your remote work easy

localize.description: ABBYY FineScanner AI是同类扫描应用中的佼佼者，它能将您的移动设备变成生产力工具，快速捕捉文档和书籍，创建PDF和DOCX格式的数字副本，并识别扫描件上的文本，以便进一步编辑和分享。
localize.tagline: 智能扫描仪应用，让你的远程工作更轻松

localize.description: ABBYY FineScanner AI是同類掃描應用中的佼佼者，它能將您的移動設備變成生產力工具，快速捕捉文檔和書籍，創建PDF和DOCX格式的數字副本，並識別掃描件上的文本，以便進一步編輯和分享。
localize.tagline: 智能掃描儀應用，讓你的遠程工作更輕鬆
